title: Uninstalled League and its the best thing since sliced bread
body: well for starters. ive been playing this game for a year. my sister showed me this game. she didnt teach me how to do anything. only thing i know and knew to that day was how to buy champs and using qwer thats about it. i have no clue about builds, seasons, masteries, the difference between a mage and marksman i dont even know how to jungle or top or mid or bot. tried going on youtube and discord to learn how to play and all of them said "just play it" welp ive been just playing it for a while now and due to the very toxic people on NA server i must admit ive gotten very frustrated and cried and screamed(PMSing) over this silly game. apparently if you are new and play bots you're a "pussy" and if u play pvp and you have 0 kills and 0 assists you are "feeding" funny how when i report players for offensive language and harassment never goes through but they always report me for "feeding" and "giving up" sorry that im so discouraged that i just choose to stay on base til the game is either lost or won or someone calls for a surrender. thanks riot for making me realize how much i hate people and also thanks for making me realize that this game is full of shit and so are you. :)

replies.body: after my rage quit i took time to analyze my feelings and i am now ready to play LoL. lmfao
